Another interesting choice is "Hitch", a film that delves into one of the most famous encounters in cinema history when Alfred Hitchcock and François Truffaut met. It's an intriguing exploration of their conversation, with actors like Will Smith and Eva Mendes rounding out the cast. Enjoy!

Given that you're looking for a movie that might not be too scary but still engaging, I'd recommend "Flatliners" (1990). This thriller stars Julia Roberts and follows five medical students exploring life after death through a dangerous experiment. It's an intriguing mix of drama, suspense, and sci-fi elements that might appeal to you.

If you're in the mood for something lighter, "Christmas with the Kranks" (2004) could be a fun choice. This comedy features an all-star cast including Jamie Lee Curtis and Tim Allen, and it's about a couple who decide to skip Christmas but have to throw one at the last minute when their daughter returns home unexpectedly.
